about_the_game:
Embark on a charming journey with our lovable cat in "The Cat."

Face mental challenges as you help the feline overcome rotating platforms in his search for the ball of wool. With hand-drawn graphics, giving the game a unique aesthetic and captivating puzzles, thus testing the player's skill, this is an engaging experience.

Get ready to jump, spin, and explore in search of the ultimate reward!

Features:
  • Handcrafted Graphics
    Explore a hand-drawn world where each scene seems to have been carefully sketched on a piece of paper. The unique aesthetic adds a special touch to the experience, giving the game a cozy and captivating atmosphere.

  • Rotating Platforms
    Challenge your navigation skills on platforms that don't stay still! Rotating platforms add a dynamic element to the game.

  • Challenging Puzzles
    Intelligence is the key to success! Tackle engaging puzzles that will test your problem-solving abilities. Each conquered challenge brings our fearless cat closer to the much-desired yarn ball.

  • Enchanting Soundtrack
    Immerse yourself in a charming soundtrack that complements the game's atmosphere. Each musical note adds a layer of immersion to the adventure of our furry protagonist.

name: The Cat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
